thread.title: Save £10 on beauty and fragrance products
thread.title_full: Save £10 on beauty and fragrance products - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Save £10 on beauty and fragrance products
text: The Telegraph has teamed up with feelunique.com to offer readers exclusive savings on top brands including bareMinerals, Hugo Boss and Paco Rabane. Choose from more than 20,000 beauty and fragrance products for both men and women, and enjoy free worldwide delivery on orders over £10 plus free UK returns. Feelunique.com is Europe’s largest premium online beauty and fragrance retailer, with more than 500 top beauty brands including Clarisonic, Benefit and Elemis. From luxury haircare and skincare brands including Redken and Decleor, to high-end fragrances such as Gucci and Calvin Klein, all your beauty essentials are only a click away. How to claim To save £10 when you spend £25 or more, use code TGPHFU when you check out. Click here to start shopping Terms and conditions Terms and conditions: 1. Discount code cannot be used in conjunction with any other offer. 2. Excludes onsite promotions and gift vouchers. 3. Only one discount code can be used per customer per order. 4. Excludes the following brands: CHANEL, Dior, Tom Ford, ghd, Moroccanoil, Kiehl’s and NYX Cosmetics. 5. Offer available until midnight on Wednesday, October 28, 2015. 6. Offer is not transferable. 7. There is no cash alternative. 8. Discount codes may be replaced or withdrawn at the promoter’s discretion if subject to misuse. Promoter: feelunique.com, 20-22 Bedford Row, London WC1R 4JS. telegraph.co.uk
